h2. Machine Buckets

The Machine Buckets tool is a portal that consolidates your resources on multiple private and public cloud stacks and offers unique actions to apply on your virtual machines:

* Enhanced 1 click deployment, auto scale, auto maintenance
* Move a virtual machine between clouds
* Console access from within your browser
* Simple user interface
* Open, simple API

h3. Features

* Start/Stop/Pause Machine
* Automated Snapshotting
* Take manual snapshot
* Self-rollback snapshots 
* Clone machine
* Export machine
* Import custom image
* Full DNS management
* Multiple hypervisor support
* Virtual networking
* Console access from browser
* Built-in server monitoring
* Scale machine package up/down
* Add storage
